author: wtopstaff
title: Canadiens-Senators Sum
text:
1 1—5 
First Period_1, Ottawa, Neil 1 (Turris, Michalek), 4:43. 2, Montreal, Weise 3, 9:17 (pp). 3, Ottawa, Hoffman 3 (Stone, Turris), 9:36. 4, Ottawa, C.Wideman 1 (Stone, Turris), 17:04. 
Second Period_5, Montreal, Galchenyuk 2 (Beaulieu, Petry), 7:18 (pp). 6, Montreal, Gallagher 1 (Beaulieu, Gilbert), 11:02. 7, Ottawa, Stone 3 (Karlsson), 16:53 (pp). 
Third Period_8, Ottawa, Ceci 2 (Hoffman, Turris), 12:59. 9, Montreal, Pacioretty 1 (Smith-Pelly, Beaulieu), 19:20. 
Shots on Goal_Montreal 19-11-7_37. Ottawa 8-5-2_15. 
Goalies_Montreal, Tokarski. Ottawa, O’Connor. A_17,912 (19,153). T_2:22. Topics:
